extDesc.message: Automatically verify cryptographic digests of downloaded and uploaded files

prefSavedMsg.description: The message displayed when saving preferences on the options page

prefMainSectionTitle.description: Title of the main section of the options page

prefVerifSectionTitle.description: Title of the verification sub-section of the options page

prefVerifCheckboxText.message: Only verify files considered dangerous (e.g. executables, archives)
prefVerifCheckboxText.description: Question about only verifying dangerous files

prefParallelHashCheckboxText.description: Question about enabling experimental parallel hashing

popupDownloadFinishedTitle.description: A title of the message informing user about a start of checksum computation upon a finished download

popupDownloadFinishedMessage.message: Hang in there while we calculate the checksums of your file
popupDownloadFinishedMessage.description: A message informing user about a start of checksum computation upon a finished download

popupDownloadFinishedNoValuesTitle.description: A title of a message informing user about inability to perform checksum computation upon a finished download

popupDownloadFinishedNoValuesMessage.message: Sorry! No algorithm names and/or hash values have been found on the website. We cannot verify your file.
popupDownloadFinishedNoValuesMessage.description: A message informing user about inability to perform checksum computation upon a finished download

popupChecksumComputedValidTitle.description: A title of a message informing user about a valid checksum

popupChecksumComputedValidMessage.message: The computed hash matches at least one value found on the web site
popupChecksumComputedValidMessage.description: A message informing user about a valid checksum

popupChecksumComputedInvalidTitle.description: A title of a message informing user about an invalid checksum

popupChecksumComputedInvalidMessage.message: Sorry! The computed hash does not match any values found on the web site. You might want to consider deleting this file
popupChecksumComputedInvalidMessage.description: A message informing user about an invalid checksum
